title: Microlearning-Based Mathematics Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (equations, functions, statistics)
context.additional_context: Context-specific customized case-based learning for current practitioners' work applications

learning_goals: Learners can solve math problems occurring in real work situations (cost calculation, data interpretation, etc.) with over 80% accuracy using micro-content.
Learners acquire core concepts through 5-minute video lectures provided three times a week and achieve over 75 points on evaluation quizzes within 24 hours.
Learners apply problem-solving strategies acquired through microlearning (algorithm design, data visualization, etc.) at least twice when performing PBL tasks.
After the course, learners present a team-based presentation showing a 20% improvement in work efficiency by applying the learned content to practical tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
